name: Satsuma
description:
Satsuma is a pixel art tap game where you try to survive 10 seconds as you slash ninjas.

As an unknown Ronin, you face countless dangerous ninjas whose mission is to kill you. Your objective? SURVIVE!

Use the mouse click to slash. But beware! If you slash in the air, you will hurt yourself.
Survive 10 seconds, killing ninjas at the right timing to win the game.

Satsuma was made in 24h as a Gamejam with Phaser in JavaScript.

Team
  • Lauri "Lightbolt" Busa : Pixel artist
  • Trystan "GaraQuor" Delhaye : Developer
